notes: get_event tool implemented (internal/toolset/event/get/) with FR-009 and NFR-002 passing. Supports explicit chat_room_id or implicit sourceID from context. Creator visibility respected - shows creator name only when showCreator=true. Times formatted in JST RFC3339. Comprehensive tests with AC-004, AC-005, AC-012, AC-013 coverage.
